arts.sum: According to a report from the journalist Sacha Tavolieri, Thibault De Smet (26) will be leaving Stade de Reims for Paris FC this winter. The two clubs have reached an…

arts.ttl: Contract extension talks between Marcin Bulka and OGC Nice break down
arts.sum: Marcin Bulka’s (25) future at OGC Nice has been in question since L’Équipe revealed in September that the Polish goalkeeper would leave the Ligue 1 club at the end of the season. …

arts.ttl: Reims predicted XI v OGC Nice: Gabriel Moscardo absent
arts.sum: Gabriel Moscardo, on international duty with the Brazilian youth team will miss Stade de Reims’ match against OGC Nice on Saturday evening. The Brazilian has struggled for game time since…

arts.ttl: West Ham enquire about Nice’s Gaëtan Laborde
arts.sum: It seems as though West Ham United want to take a second look at Gaëtan Laborde (30) and have made inquiries about his services once again, according to a report…

arts.ttl: Preview: Reims vs. Nice - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Ligue 1 clash between Reims and Nice, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Reims submit offer for Lyon’s Mahamadou Diawara
arts.sum: As reported by L’Équipe at the start of December, Mahamadou Diawara (19) wants to leave Olympique Lyonnais this January. He has made just four first-team appearances all season, registering a meagre 37…

Reims come into Saturday's welcome of Nice on a run of one win in their last six, and that came in the Coupe de France. They have failed to win their last four at home. Nice did well to claim a 3-2 h...

arts.ttl: Wolves sign Reims defender Agbadou for £16.6m
arts.sum: Wolves complete the £16.6m signing of defender Emmanuel Agbadou from Reims on a four-and-a-half year deal.
